name: Classic Vision Care
description: Optometry clinic with two locations in Kennesaw and East Cobb/Marietta, Georgia. Comprehensive eye exams, dry eye treatment, myopia control, and eyewear.

primary_tasks.notes: Booking form. Use query param location=kennesaw or location=eastcobb when the patient's preferred location is known.
Submit a non-emergency contact request. Requires name and valid email. Accepts JSON or form-urlencoded.
Lists both clinic locations with addresses, phone numbers, and hours.
Kennesaw office details: 1615 Ridenour Blvd Suite 201, Kennesaw, GA 30152. Phone: (770) 499-2020.
East Cobb/Marietta office details: 3535 Roswell Rd Suite 8, Marietta, GA 30062. Phone: (678) 560-8065.
Overview of all eye care services offered.
List of accepted insurance carriers and verification info.

rate_limit_policy.contact_request: 10 requests per minute per IP; 429 returned when exceeded
